articles.description: Xabi Alonso says it is "not a good time" to discuss his future after the Bayer Leverkusen boss was linked with Real Madrid.
articles.title: Xabi Alonso: 'Not the time to discuss future', says Spaniard on Real Madrid links

articles.description: Follow live text commentary and score updates from Friday's fixtures across the EFL Championship.
articles.title: EFL Championship LIVE: Derby v Luton plus more text and score

articles.description: Listen to live radio commentary and follow text updates from the first practice and second practice sessions at the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 practice LIVE: Saudi Arabia Grand Prix 2025 times, results, radio and updates

articles.description: Top seed Carlos Alcaraz is through to the Barcelona Open semi-finals after a straight sets win win over Alex de Minaur.
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz beats Alex de Minaur to reach Barcelona Open semi-finals

articles.description: Burnley recover from a goal down at nine-man Watford to take a big step towards sealing a Premier League return.
articles.title: Watford 1-2 Burnley: Zian Flemming and Josh Brownhill goals edge Clarets closer to Premier League

articles.description: Jai Field and Abbas Miski score two tries apiece as Wigan Warriors beat St Helens in the Good Friday derby
articles.title: Super League: Wigan Warriors 24-14 St Helens

articles.description: Arne Slot believes keeping his team together would mark a "big summer" for Liverpool and said Trent Alexander-Arnold's future is still "not done".
articles.title: Arne Slot: Liverpool boss on Trent Alexander-Arnold and keeping team together in summer

articles.description: Alpine's Pierre Gasly sets the pace ahead of McLaren's Lando Norris in first practice at the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Saudi Arabian Grand Prix: Pierre Gasly heads Lando Norris in first practice

articles.description: Manchester United defender Harry Maguire says his side's win against Lyon was the "strangest game" of his career.
articles.title: Manchester United win against Lyon 'maddest game I've played in' - Harry Maguire

articles.description: Double Olympic champion Remco Evenepoel wins the Brabantse Pijl in his first race back since suffering multiple bone fractures in a serious crash last year.
articles.title: Remco Evenepoel wins Brabantse Pijl in his first race back since serious injury
